inclusion: The study applied Large Language Models on health-related data
The study aimed to identify or assess potential biases in outcomes
The paper is a full-length pee-reviewed research article
exclusion: The paper is a tutorial, opinion piece, review, letter
The paper is not written in English
The study did not use Large Language Models for assessment
The study did not assess health-related data
The study solely focused on biases in Large Language Model training data rather than model outputs
They study only examined biomedical literature, exam material education content with no patients or clinicians explicitly being the intended end users
